channel.title: Behind The Scenes on This Is How To Code
channel.description: Recent content in Behind The Scenes on This Is How To Code

item.title: My Stream/Recording Setup
item.description: First off, you don’t need all this to get started. It took me a year to put this together (not including all the stuff I had from my former life as a photographer). I got started with the built-in webcam. They’re prefectly fine for getting up and running. With that said, here’s what my setup looks like as of January 2021: PC 2016 era Windows 10 Desktop PC Insignia 43" 4K TV Moonlander Keyboard Logitech G502 Hero Mouse Elgato 4K60 Pro MK.
